column2: "Mma mmfa ɔkyena nntuw woho; Na innyim dza eda no dze bɛba."
"Ma obi nkamfo wo
column3: na nnyɛ woara w'ano a; Ɔhɔho ei
column4: na nnyɛ woara w'anofamfa bi a."

column2: "Ɔbo yɛ dur
column3: na anhwea yɛ pembɔɔ; Naaso ɔkwasea n'ebufuw yɛ dur sen ebien nyina."

column2: "Ebufuhyew yɛ etsirmɔdzen
column3: na ebufuw yɛ ewurkadze; Na woana na obotum egyina nyinkun enyim?"

column2: "Enyimka petee ye Sen ɔdɔ a ohuntsa."
"Ɔnyɛnko pira wo a
column3: ɔyɛ nokwar: Na ɔtamfo ne mfewano dze

column2: "Ɔkra a ɔamee tsiatsia wokyɛm do
column3: Na ɔkra a ɔkɔm dze no dze
column4: adze wenwen biara yɛ no dɛw."

column2: "Mbrɛ anoma a ofi ne berɛbuw mu kyinkyin tse no
column3: Mbrɛ nyimpa so a ofi ne fie kyinkyin tse ara nye no."

column2: "Ngo na eduhuam ma akoma dzi ehurusi: Mbrɛ nyimpa ne nyɛnko ho dɛw a ofi apam a ofi akoma mu so tse ara nye no."
"Mma mmpa woara wo nyɛnko
column3: na w'egya ne nyɛnko; Na mma nnkɛhɛn wo nua fie wɔ wo mbusu da no mu: Ɔnyɛnko a ɔbɛn no
column4: oye sen onua a ɔwɔ ekyirekyir."

column2: "Me ba
column3: hu nyansa
column5: Ama meenya bi ebua nyia ogu m'enyim ase no."

column2: "Ɔbadwembanyi hu mbusu
column3: na osuma noho: Na adwenharfo dze

column2: "Fa nyia odzi ɔhɔho egyinamu no n'efuradze; Na fa nyia odzi ɔbaa sansanyi egyinamu no si ahoba."
"Nyia ɔsoɛr anapahema dze ndze kɛse hyira ne nyɛnko no
column3: Wobobu no ndom ama no."

column2: "Esusow dzendzen ber mu daa nsosɔwee Na ɔbaa a ohwinhwin
column3: wɔsɛ pɛr:"

column2: "Nyia ɔpɛ dɛ osianka no no
column3: osianka mframa
column4: Na ne nsa nyimfa mu ngo sɔnsɔn."

column2: "Dadze sew dadze ano; Dɛmara so na nyimpa sew ne nyɛnko enyim."
"Nyia ɔhwɛ adɔmbadua do no
column3: obedzi n'aba bi; Na nyia ɔsom no wura no

column2: "Mbrɛ enyim kyerɛ enyim wɔ nsu mu no
column3: Dɛmara so na nyimpa akoma kyerɛ nyimpa."

column2: "Samanadze na owumona wɔmmee ara da; Dɛmara so na nyimpa n'enyiwa mmee ara da."
"Ogya na wɔdze sɔ sika na dwetɛ hwɛ
column3: Na nyimpa dze

column2: "Kaansa edze dwomba bɔwɔw ɔkwasea wɔ wɔdur mu afora ewu mu mpo a
column3: No nkwaseadze nnkefi no ho ara da."

column2: "Bɔ mbɔdzen hu mbrɛ wo nguan ekuwekuw no tsetsee
column3: Na hwɛ w'anantwi ekuwekuw no yie."

column2: "Na ahonya nntsena hɔ daa; Na aso ahenkyɛw kyɛr kodu mbasantsen nyinara do?"
"Wotwa nkyɛkyɛr
column3: na nkyɛkyɛr momon so fefɛw
column4: Na wɔboaboa mbepɔw do habanmba ano."

column2: "Nguambaa wɔ hɔ ma w'efuradze
column3: Na mpɔnkye yɛ haban ne tsibo:"

column2: "Na wobenya mpɔnkye enumfonsu a ɔbɔso w'edziban
column3: na wo fiefo edziban; Na wo mbabaawa akɔhomabɔdze."
